content: तंतुः [तन् तुन्] {@--1@} A thread, cord, wire, string, line; चिंतासंततितंतु <ls>Māl. 5. 10</ls>; <ls>Me. 70.</ls> {@--2@} A cob-web; <ls>R. 16. 20.</ls> {@--3@} A filament; बिसतंतुगुणस्य कारितं <ls>Ku. 4. 29.</ls> {@--4@} An offspring, issue, race. {@--5@} A shark. {@--6@} The Supreme Being.
